With Shinki's chakra coating Araya's blade, he can manipulate the latter's [[Iron Sand]] through the use of Wind Release. Because [[Ryū]] is modeled from Shinki, Araya was able to use the jutsu to free others manipulated by the same material.

== Trivia ==
* This technique was developed by Shinki in his goal to protect his adoptive father, [[Gaara]].<ref>''Boruto: Two Blue Vortex'' Chapter 19, page 3</ref>
